I work for customer support and understood concepts of WFM, and I can tell you that based on our client's current contract with us, it's extremely difficult to maintain flexibility when a huge swarm of calls suddenly appear and we end up with a shortage and not enough agents to answer calls from customers.

We need as many agents to answer calls if we want to meet our clients' quota, or they will switch to a competitor who's willing to do better and they'll liquidate our account, leaving thousands of us unemployed.
